text: 14.5 Nam 11.29 Nɨbi mɨdupsek, God Kawnan ne ak nɨbop kɨles ñek, takaw yɨbɨl keke agɨnɨmɨb agɨl gos nepin. Gos olap adek awl ak pen nepin, God nɨbop gos ñek agñɨnɨmɨb. Binɨb God Kawnan ne ak kɨlop kɨles ñek takaw yɨbɨl keke agenɨgel okok, tɨg adɨkɨl agtep gɨl agñenɨgel, gɨtep gɨl Klays binɨb ne okok kɨli gos sek mɨdɨl kɨles gɨl jak tep gɨl yenɨgel. Binɨb pen takaw yɨbɨl keke apal ak tɨg adɨkɨl agñenɨgel tek ma lup okok, gɨtep ma gɨl wog kɨli sɨkol gɨpal. Pen binɨb God kɨlop gos ñek agñɨbal okok, kɨli gɨtep gɨl wog awl gɨpal.
